meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the stars.
meanings.sent1: The subastral sky was filled with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent2: The campers enjoyed the subastral view of the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The subastral picnic was lit by the glow of distant stars.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared through the subastral expanse of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The subastral beauty of the night sky left them in awe.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the region below the stars.
meanings.sent1: The subastral creatures thrived in the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of subastral beings that roamed the earth at night.
meanings.sent3: The subastral realm was said to be home to mystical creatures.
meanings.sent4: His mind wandered to the subastral mysteries hidden from human eyes.
meanings.sent5: The subastral world held secrets waiting to be discovered.
